(There may be some redundancy here in these PATHs.)

I do not see any dyld: warning when doing import tensorflow.

dtruss does not seem to work in my case due to a codesign problem (never used that before; does that require an apple developer membership?).

body:
`echo $DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH`
/usr/local/cuda/lib:/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-7.5/lib:
`echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH`
/usr/local/cuda/lib:/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-7.5/lib:
(There may be some redundancy here in these PATHs.)

I do not see any `dyld: warning` when doing import tensorflow.

`dtruss` does not seem to work in my case due to a `codesign` problem (never used that before; does that require an apple developer membership?).
